txt.en: The Orcs of Moria have begun mustering in Fanuidhol in preparation to assault Lothlórien.

'The Orcs at Mokûrz Gundul must be shown that we are stronger than they. To accomplish this, I would have you enter the encampment and burn their banner down before them.

'This act will no doubt attract the attention of the champion of Mokûrz Gundul...if so, you should dispose of the creature with due haste.

'Mokûrz Gundul lies to the north of here. When you have done this deed, return to me.'
Mokûrz Gundul lies to the north from Talan Fanuidhol.\n\nMaenhador has asked you to burn the Orc-banner at Mokûrz Gundul and defeat the camp's champion.
'You have done well, [placeholder]. To bring down such a terrible foe is worthy of great praise.'
Maenhador is at Talan Fanuidhol, south of Mokûrz Gundul.\n\nYou should return to Maenhador with the tidings of your victory at Mokûrz Gundul.
'Head north to Mokûrz Gundul and deal with the enemy there.'
'You do not belong here! You will not leave alive, Elf-friend!'
Burn banner at Mokûrz Gundul and defeat Nákurz
Talk to Maenhador at Talan Fanuidhol
Talk to Maenhador at Talan Fanuidhol
